issue.title: Move user data storage to Node from Visual

content.raw: yeah that sounds good to me. We released ign-rendering3 with this feature already so just need to make sure we don’t break ABI. If we want this in ign-rendering3, the function may need to be duplicated in Node class and we’ll just make a note to remove the one from Visual class in ign-rendering4
content.html: yeah that sounds good to me. We released ign-rendering3 with this feature already so just need to make sure we don’t break ABI. If we want this in ign-rendering3, the function may need to be duplicated in Node class and we’ll just make a note to remove the one from Visual class in ign-rendering4
